amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's Mexican Border program for safe drinking water grants by $15 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for the Office of the Secretary (Indian Affairs) by $5,000,000. And, increase the State and Tribal assistance grants funds program under the EPA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Dicks.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
